fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment
eu_initiatives: We follow the Small Business Initiative and are actively contributing to the European Social Innovation Competition.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission expert group on social economy and social enterprises #E03576#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3576#Member#C
membership: we are member of EVPA, SEISMIC, GSEN, Benisi and The Shift
goals__remit: The Social Innovation Factory is a networking organization that promotes, coaches and supports social innovations and social entrepreneurship in Flanders and Brussels.
relevant_communication: SIF is partner in the SPARK social enterprise project. The Spark Social Enterprise Project has received funding from the Interreg 2 Seas Programme 2014-2020 co-funded by the European Regional Development Fund under subsidy contract No 2S01-043
